column2: an A.M. Eatery////I wanted to try some of the different pancakes so I got the Pancake Flight - blueberry
column3: chocolate chip and peanut butter cup
column4: side of bacon and hash-browns. I wouldn't recommend getting two chocolate pancakes on the Flight
column5: it was a little too much. The blueberry had a unique flavor
column6: the batter had a hint of cornmeal. The bacon was out of this world!
